overview: Hollywood Hogan defends the WCW World Heavyweight Championship against "Rowdy" Roddy Piper. Lex Luger & The Giant challenge The Outsiders for the WCW Tag Team Championship. Eddy Guerrero defends the WCW United States Championship against Chris Jericho. "Diamond" Dallas Page, Rey Misterio Jr., and more!
tagline: The BIG ONE will hit SAN FRAN when the BIG BOYS play
title: WCW SuperBrawl VII
